# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /public/

# Block access to sensitive files
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /*_buildManifest.js$
Disallow: /*_ssgManifest.js$
Disallow: /*.js.map$

# Crawl delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.sembagigreenresources.com/sitemap.xml

# Additional information
# Contact: info@sembagigreenresources.com
# Website: https://www.sembagigreenresources.com
